LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.0.label: no herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind. I feel so unsafe being all alone.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.1.label: small herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small herd. I still don't feel very safe.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.2.label: decent herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.2.description: There's a decent number of people in my herd. Safety in numbers!
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.3.label: huge herd
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my herd. There's nothing to fear!
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.0.label: no pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind. I feel so alone without a proper pack.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.1.label: small pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small pack. It's a bit lonely.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.2.label: decent pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.2.description: There's a decent number people in my pack. I'm glad to have them.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.3.label: huge pack
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my pack. This is great!

LanguageData.EtherAvianTail.stages.0.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherAvianTail.stages.0.description: ...does this make my butt look big?

LanguageData.EtherAvianTail.stages.1.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.
LanguageData.EtherAvianTail.stages.2.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherAvianTail.stages.2.description: I look like a damn bird, whyyyy?!
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I'm... covered in feathers... OUCH! What!? Did I just lay an *egg*! Oh no...
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I'm all feathery, and these wings are nea- BWAK! What the- An egg! Neat!
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: Oh man, these feathers are disgusting, and the talons look fr- BWAK! What the — oh no... please tell me that's not an egg...
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: These feathers and talons are so good, and laying eggs! If only I could just settle down in a nesting box.
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more laying eggs. Or eating eggs, please.
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: But the feathers! The *eggs*! Didn't you like the breakfast I made?
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: Hands and feet. And most important, no more eggs. EVER.
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.TurkeyTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: This thing on my... beak... is gross...
LanguageData.TurkeyTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: What... is this thing hanging from my face?!
LanguageData.TurkeyTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: These feathers and talons are so cool!
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I'm back to my normal, human self again!
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: But the feathers were so cool...
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.descriptio: Hands, feet, and a normal face. Thank Randy.
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.TurkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: I'm- QUACK! covered in feathers- QUACK!
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: They way these feathers feel is amazing! Now where can I find some bread...
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: Oh man, I look like some kind of monster. I want revenge on the QUACK that did this to me.
LanguageData.DuckTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more feathers...
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: But the feathers! My beak! I would have preferred to stay that way.
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Hands at last. I can go the rest of my life without eating bread.
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.DuckRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: I'm- HONK! covered in feathers- HONK!
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: I think I could tie up this look with a red bow around my neck.
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: Change me back! I- HONK! -ing hate geese!
LanguageData.GooseTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more feathers...
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: But the feathers! My beak! I would have preferred to stay that way.
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Hands at last. I'd prefer not to be a demon-spawn bird.
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.GooseRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: Why do I feel like attacking the next person I see?
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: These legs feel so powerful! This beak looks so threatening!
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: These feathers are coarse and disgusting. Is this a tumor growing out of my head?!
LanguageData.CassowaryTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: I never thought I could feel so strong with avian genes!
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I'm back to normal! I very much prefer not being a living dinosaur.
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: Awww... I'll miss those strong legs.
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: No more rough feathers. I'm not going to miss that growth on my head either.
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CassowaryRevertedMemory.stages.3.descrip: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I don't think I can get used to walking around like this.
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: I can run so quickly now!
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: These feathers are coarse and disgusting. I don't want to be an overgrown chicken!
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.EmuTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: This is pretty cool. I wonder how fast I can run now.
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to normal! I very much prefer not being a living dinosaur.
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Awww... I'll miss those fast legs.
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more rough feathers! No more beak!
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EmuRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I don't think I can get used to walking around like this.
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: Is anyone up for a race?
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: These feathers are coarse and disgusting. I don't want to be an overgrown chicken!
LanguageData.OstrichTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: This is pretty cool. I wonder how fast I can run now.
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm back to normal! I very much prefer not being a living dinosaur.
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: Awww... I'll miss those fast legs.
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: No more rough feathers! No more beak!
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.OstrichRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: I feel so... slow... and... tired.
LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: Ahh... time to just stretch out and relax, I think... zzz...
LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: This is nice, but imagine the full-sized body... much better...
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I think I've had all the sleep I need for five years.
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: I actually have energy to do things now!
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stages.0.label: Sloth face
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stages.1.label: Sloth face
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stages.2.label: Sloth face
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.0.label: Fluff tuft
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.0.description: This tail is too heavy. Or is it just that I'm slower now?
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.1.label: Fluff tuft
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.1.description: I can't complain about a massive, fluffy tail!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.2.label: Fluff tuft
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.2.description: God, this thing drags dirt everywhere...
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.0.label: Thick wool
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.0.description: I feel like I spend every waking minute shaving this stuff off...
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.1.label: Thick wool
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.1.description: It's like a giant, fluffy blanket...and it goes wherever I go!
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.2.label: Thick wool
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.2.description: This wool is thick, hot and itchy...I don't like it one bit!
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: I'm so heavy, and this trunk gets in the way.
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: Wow, this is so great I think I might let out a TOOT!
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: I bet I'd be even bigger as a full elephant, you know.
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: I think I'll celebrate... with a salad.
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: I feel much smaller now. This is the opposite of what I wanted!
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.0.label: Elephant trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.1.label: Elephant Trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.1.description: I gotta give this a toot.
LanguageData.EtherElephantTrunk.stages.2.label: Elephant Trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.0.label: Huge ears
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.0.description: These things are always flopping around and getting in the way...
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.1.label: Huge ears
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.1.description: I can hear everything for miles!
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.2.label: Huge ears
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.2.description: Could it get any more obvious that I'm a mutated freak?
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.0.label: Elephant tail
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.1.label: Elephant tail
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.2.label: Elephant tail
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.0.label: Huge feet
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.0.description: These things are the size of a dinner plate.
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.1.label: Huge feet
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.1.description: Stomp, stomp, stomp! This is fun!
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.2.label: Huge feet
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.2.description: What am I gonna do with my shoes?
I feel so heavy, and this horn is really something else.
I'm a huge war machine, this is incredible!
I'm going to run you over if you don't turn me back right now!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.0.descri: I'm normal again, and there's no heavy horn on my face!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.1.descri: I feel so much weaker. I'm not as special as before.
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.2.descri: I feel human again, and those bestial features are gone!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.3.descri: I feel so weak now. I wanted more, not less!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.0.label: Rhino horn
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.0.description: Let's hope the colony doesn't want to mount my head on a wall...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.1.label: Rhino horn
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.1.description: Look at this majestic horn, I feel powerful!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.2.label: Rhino horn
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.2.description: I WILL STAB SOMEBODY WITH THIS THING.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.0.label: Rhino ears
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.0.description: Did someone stick some tubes on my ears?
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.1.label: Rhino ears
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.1.description: Perfect for healing and cooling you off a bit!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.2.label: Rhino ears
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.2.description: I'm used to my ears, not these weird tubes...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.0.label: Rhino tail
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.0.description: It's just a useless piece of skin hanging of me...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.1.label: Rhino tail
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.2.label: Rhino tail
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.2.description: Why do I even have this...weird tail thing?!
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: This strength isn't bad, but I feel like I'm constantly hungry.
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I feel so strong and graceful!
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: Ugh! Get this horn off of me!
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: I love this strength and this beautiful horn... I bet it would feel better to fully become the wisest animal on the Rim!
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Feels good to rid of that heavy fur.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I miss all that strength, and that graceful horn.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: I don't think I could have handled being like that for much longer.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I wanted to go further, not go back!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.0.label: Thrumbo face
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.0.description: A bit messy, I don't exactly like it.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.1.label: Thrumbo face
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.1.description: I go really go for a tree right now!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.2.label: Thrumbo face
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.2.description: Sloppy and gross, I want it off!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.0.label: Thrumbo ear
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.0.description: They're pretty good at hearing, I'll give them that.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.1.label: Thrumbo ear
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.1.description: Wonderful ears for a wonderful creature!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.2.label: Thrumbo ear
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.2.description: They're stupid, and I don't want to have them...
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.0.label: Thrumbo tail
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.0.description: Having a tail is quite strange but it does feel very luxurious.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.1.label: Thrumbo tail
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.1.description: It's so soft and velvety! Who needs a pillow when I have this?
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.2.label: Thrumbo tail
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.2.description: I don't care if some think it's majestic, I HATE it.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.0.label: Razor horn
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.0.description: Ouch! This thing is VERY sharp.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.1.label: Razor horn
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.1.description: It's majestic...no wait, it's me that is majestic now.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.2.label: Razor horn
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.2.description: Maybe if I let them cut it off and sell it...maybe they could get some medicine that could undo this...please...
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.0.label: Canid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.0.description: I sound ridiculous trying to speak with this thing.
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.1.label: Canid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.1.description: So many scents! This is incredible!
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.2.label: Canid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCanidMuzzle.stages.2.description: I'm smelling things I wish I couldn't. I want my old face back.
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.0.label: Canid ears
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.0.description: They're a bit too sensitive, everything's too loud for comfort.
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.1.label: Canid ears
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.1.description: My hearing is so clear now, I bet I could hear a pin drop on the other side of the colony!
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.2.label: Canid ears
LanguageData.EtherCanidEar.stages.2.description: I swear I can hear them talking about me. Why is this happening to me?
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.0.label: Canid tail
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.0.description: I hope making a tail-hole in my pants won't be too hard.
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.1.label: Canid tail
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.1.description: Whenever I think about it it just starts to wag!
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.2.label: Canid tail
LanguageData.EtherCanidTail.stages.2.description: I can't even sit on a chair without this damn thing getting in the way!
So I'm the pet dog now? ...arf?
They keep telling me 'fetch'...but I'm not a damn dog!
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.0.descri: Phew... I was having a bit too much fun.
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.1.descri: I'm not as peppy as I used to be.
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.2.descri: I'm not a stinky dog anymore!
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.FamiliarisRevertedMemory.stages.3.descri: No more napping on laps for me.
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.0.label: dog face
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.0.description: I just need to pant all the time...
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.1.label: dog face
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.2.label: dog face
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisJaw.stages.2.description: I can't be sad with this smile...
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.0.label: dog ears
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.0.description: They're pretty cute, I gotta say.
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.1.label: dog ears
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.1.description: They look cute, and I can hear better than before. A win-win!
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.2.label: dog ears
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisEar.stages.2.description: I want my own ears back, give them BARK!
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.0.label: dog tail
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.0.description: I gotta calm down, it keeps wagging...
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.1.label: dog tail
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.1.description: I'm so excited, it's wagging so fast!
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.2.label: dog tail
LanguageData.EtherFamiliarisTail.stages.2.description: Why do I have to ruin all my pants for a tail that won't stop wagging?
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: This fur is making me so hot. I think I need to start panting.
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: This fur is horrible, and all these smells are overwhelming.
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I love this fur and all these smells, I want to go even further!
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Everything smells normal again, and the urge to howl is gone!
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
I'm so angry all the time now
I feel so strong, so alive
I feel like a monster, I can barely control myself
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.0.desc: finially, I feel like I can relax
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.1.desc: I just got used to all that strength
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.3.desc: I'm so weak now, change me back!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: I feel so brutish and bestial.
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: These muscles make me feel so powerful, like I could run forever!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: I look so ugly and animalistic. I don't want this at all!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I feel so bestial and strong. I bet it would be even better as a full warg!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm normal again, and veggies don't taste disgusting anymore!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I feel so much weaker, and meat tastes so bland now.
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Those bestial features and urges are gone, phew!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I feel so weak now. I wanted more, not less!
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.0.label: Warg face
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.0.description: These jaws are very strong...I REALLY hope I don't bite my tongue by accident.
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.1.label: Warg face
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.1.description: The bite force of these jaws is incredible! No need for cutlery any more!
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.2.label: Warg face
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.2.description: I look like a rabid beast...
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.0.label: Warg ears
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.0.description: I swear these things move as if they have a mind of their own.
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.1.label: Warg ears
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.1.description: I can hear prey from a mile away!
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.2.label: Warg ears
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.2.description: Theses ears belong on a corpse eating warg...NOT ME.
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.0.label: Warg tail
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.0.description: Damn thing keeps knocking over everything it touches!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.1.label: Warg tail
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.1.description: This thing is unbelievably strong, I could probably beat someone in an arm wrestle with it!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.2.label: Warg tail
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.2.description: It's bristly, stiff and has an unnatural amount of muscle in it...disgusting.
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.0.label: feline face
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.1.label: feline face
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.2.label: feline face
LanguageData.EtherFelineJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.0.label: feline ear
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.0.description: Ouch, these things can hear everything.
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.1.label: feline ear
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.2.label: feline ear
LanguageData.EtherFelineEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.0.label: feline tail
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.0.description: This tail keeps getting in the way, but it's good for balance.
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.1.label: feline tail
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.2.label: feline tail
LanguageData.EtherFelineTail.stages.2.description: I keep tripping over this stupid tail!
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.0.label: feline eyes
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.0.description: My eyes feel strange, but I can see better than I ever could before.
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.1.label: feline eyes
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.1.description: I can see in the dark better than ever, and my eyes look so mysterious!
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.2.label: feline eyes
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stages.2.description: These slit pupils make me look unnatural.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.0.label: Claws
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.1.label: Claws
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.1.description: Claws are so useful, I'll never need a knife again!
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.2.label: Claws
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.2.description: I keep poking holes in my clothes with these unruly claws!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: I have this uncontrollable urge to pounce and hunt things.
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: I'm so sleek and svelte, this is fantastic!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: I don't want to be a stupid big cat! I hate cats!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: Meow! Now, to go the rest of the way?
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: Those claws were really getting in the way.
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: Not fair, I enjoyed feeling so sleek.
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: This is the opposite of what I wanted.
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: I'm not just a regular cat, I'm a cool-looking lynx!
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I think I want to go out and hunt mice.
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: That fur was getting stuffy... and I shed too much.
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I'm... a cat? No, don't pet me. I do have claws and I will cut you.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: Cat? I'm a kitty cat! And I dance dance dance, and I dance dance dance.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: The world is too detailed and so bright. I keep cutting myself with these damn claws.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: Wow, the world looks so sharp, and these claws are sharp too! Imagine if I could look into all the small places on all fours!
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more fur or claws.
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying threatening to claw people.
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more claws! Finally, I'll stop accidentally stabbing myself.
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.0.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.1.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.2.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.2.description: Great, a face not even a mother could love.
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.0.label: Spotted face
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.1.label: Spotted face
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.2.label: Spotted face
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.0.label: Leopard ears
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.0.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad.
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.1.label: Leopard ears
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.2.label: Leopard ears
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.0.label: Spotted tail
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.1.label: Spotted tail
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.1.description: It's not as fluffy as I would have liked, but it's still cool!
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.2.label: Spotted tail
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.2.description: This thing has a mind of its own! Get it off me!
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.0.label: Snowy face
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.1.label: Snowy face
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.2.label: Snowy face
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.0.label: Snowy ears
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.0.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad. They're kinda cute, actually.
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.1.label: Snowy ears
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.2.label: Snowy ears
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.0.label: Snowy tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.0.descriptio: Sure, it's fluffy and all, but it kind of gets in the way...
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.1.label: Snowy tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.1.descriptio: So big! So fluffy! I love it!
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.2.label: Snowy tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.2.descriptio: God, this thing is always getting in my way...
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I have this uncontrollable urge to pounce and hunt things.
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I'm so sleek and svelte, this is fantastic!
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I don't want to be a stupid big cat! I hate cats!
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: Meow! Now, to go the rest of the way?
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Those claws were really getting in the way.
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: Not fair, I enjoyed feeling so sleek.
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: This is the opposite of what I wanted.
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I feel like I need to be hunting chickens, but I don't want to!
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: YIP! This is great! Time for an egg sandwich.
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: Ooh, so sleek — it could be fun to go full fox.
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I was so fluffy! This isn't what I wanted!
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.0.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.0.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.1.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.1.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.2.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.2.description: ...if there's one awful mutation I'm OK with...
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.0.label: Fox eyes
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.0.description: I look reasonably exotic with these...
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.1.label: Fox eyes
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.1.description: I can see in the dark, and they look so cool!
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.2.label: Fox eyes
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.0.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.1.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.1.description: Oh, so that's how foxes make all those cool noises! Yip!
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.2.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.2.description: My face is ruined, and I can't even talk right!
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.0.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.0.description: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.1.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.1.description: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.2.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.2.description: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!
LanguageData.RaccoonTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I feel like digging in the trash, but... eugh.
LanguageData.RaccoonTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I don't want to be a smelly raccoon!
LanguageData.RaccoonTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: Wow, look at these dainty claws!
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more garbage, please.
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: Aw man, but I looked so sneaky and cool.
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: I don't think I can stand the smell of rubbish now.
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.0.label: Raccoon mask
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.0.description: I feel like I should be rooting around in a trash can.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.1.label: Raccoon mask
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.2.label: Raccoon mask
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.2.description: Why do I want to eat garbage...
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.0.label: Raccoon ears
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.0.description: They're alright, but I'd prefer to have my normal ears.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.1.label: Raccoon ears
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.2.label: Raccoon ears
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.0.label: Ringtail
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.0.description: The pattern on this thing is kinda cool, I guess.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.1.label: Ringtail
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.1.description: It's like a tube of fluffiness! Tails are great!
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.2.label: Ringtail
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: My dentist is gonna hate this.
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: Grass tastes so much better now for some reason.
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: My teeth, they're so big! Gross!
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: Nice, but imagine being picked up and hugged.
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Phew, those ears were getting in the way.
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Eugh, grass tastes gross again, no thank you!
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: MY TEETH ARE NORMAL AGAIN! REJOICE!
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.0.label: Rabbit face
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.0.description: These whiskers and teeth are dumb.
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.1.label: Rabbit face
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.1.description: Check out my cute little button nose, I love it!
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.2.label: Rabbit face
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.2.description: I wasn't eating a leaf, you didn't see that!
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.label: Rabbit ears
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.description: This has been one bad magic trick.
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.1.label: Rabbit ears
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.1.description: They're so cute, it's like I belong in a Playboy!
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.2.label: Rabbit ears
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.2.description: These ears keep getting in the way!
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.0.label: Cotton tail
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.1.label: Cotton tail
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.2.label: Cotton tail
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.2.description: No, stop asking if I stole the carrots!
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.label: Springy legs
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.description: If I hear one more 'spring in my step' joke...
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.label: Springy legs
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.description: I guess these things ARE lucky!
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.label: Springy legs
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.description: This is wrong. My feet are wrong, they're covered in fur...this is WRONG!
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.0.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.0.descriptio: These paws sure are good at picking up little things off the ground.
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.1.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.1.descriptio: They're so dainty and dextrous, these are better than my old hands!
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.2.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.2.descriptio: Ahhhhh! They're so wrinkly! Get them off me!
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.0.label: rodent face
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.1.label: rodent face
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.1.description: I can eat whatever I want!
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.2.label: rodent face
LanguageData.EtherRodentJaw.stages.2.description: God, I look so ugly with this thing...
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.0.label: rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.0.description: Why are my ears so small?
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.1.label: rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.1.description: These tiny ears are so cute!
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.2.label: rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherRodentEar.stages.2.description: Does anyone have a hat I can hide these things under?
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.0.label: rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.1.label: rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.1.description: I wish it was better at something...
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.2.label: rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherRodentTail.stages.2.description: I feel dirty and like a thief, like this is a punishment...
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.0: I have.. An unpleasant urge to chew on trees. It's very distracting.
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.1: I have powerful teeth, and a powerful tail. I feel like I could build a dam by myself!
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.2: How am I supothst to sthpeak with thethse giant teeth?! Let alone eat?!
LanguageData.AlphabeaverTransformationMemory.stages.3: This is fantastic! But can I go any further with this...?
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.0.descr: I'm back to normal, but it feels like I have splinters in my gums...
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.1.descr: I'll miss my fur coat. And being able to bite through wood.
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.2.descr: I'm back to my old self! No more buck teeth for me!
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlphabeaverRevertedMemory.stages.3.descr: So close to my dream, and yet, so far...
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.0.label: Beaver face
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.0.description: That tree over there looks delicious...
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.1.label: Beaver face
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stages.2.label: Beaver face
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.0.label: Beaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.0.description: These ears are kind of weird.
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.1.label: Beaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.2.label: Beaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stages.2.description: These ears are really weird, get them off!
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.0.label: Beaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.1.label: Beaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.2.label: Beaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stages.2.descriptio: I want to use this thing to slap whoever did this to me!
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: I'm a.. Rodent of some kind? These teeth are awkward.
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: I have a lovely coat of fur, even if it is a tad thin.
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: This is awful! Look at my teeth, what happened to my legs?! Help!
LanguageData.CapybaraTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: One step closer to the wild side.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: Back to normal, that fur was getting a bit itchy.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: I miss my fur, it was nice and warm.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: Aah, back to normal. I've never missed my skin so much.
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CapybaraRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: No! I was so close! Why did they change me back?!
LanguageData.SquirrelTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: Climbing trees, burying nuts... this is the life!
LanguageData.SquirrelTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: These giant teeth, this massive, bushy tail... turn me back, please!
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: Back to normal! Those teeth were annoying.
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: Aw, but I kind of liked being a squirrel.
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: I'm never going to eat nuts again!
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: But I wanted to be a cute squirrel!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.0.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.1.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.1.description: I could eat nuts all day long!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.2.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.3.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.3.description: I could live off nuts alone...just like in the wild!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.0.label: Squirrel ear
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.0.description: These ears are a little weird, but not too bad.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.1.label: Squirrel ear
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.1.description: Did I just hear a bird?
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.2.label: Squirrel ear
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.0.label: Squirrel tail
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.0.description: Come on, does it *have* to be this big?
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.1.label: Squirrel tail
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.1.description: I just wanna use this thing as a blanket!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.2.label: Squirrel tail
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.2.description: What's the point in having such a big tail?
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: Being a rat is one thing, but an explosive one...?
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: These sacs are kinda' gross, but also really cool! I'm a chemfuel factory!
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I'm covered in chemical pustules. This is disgusting, change me back!
LanguageData.BoomratTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: Not far from the real deal!
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm no longer high-explosive, which is nice. Maybe people will stop avoiding me now.
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I kinda' miss being a weapon of mass destruction.
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: The memories will haunt me, but I'm normal again!
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: Reverted
LanguageData.BoomratRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I could have been so much more, what a waste.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.0.label: Petrol face
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.1.label: Petrol face
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.1.description: I look cute, for an explosive rat.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.2.label: Petrol face
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stages.2.description: HOW? How could there be something worse than a rat!?
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.0.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.1.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.1.description: This make enemy easier to hear, yes-yes?
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.2.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stages.2.description: I have a deep feeling that makes me want to hear an explosion, I don't like this one bit!
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.0.label: Petrol tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.0.description: I keep getting this useless skinny tail stuck in all the doors.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.1.label: Petrol tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.2.label: Petrol tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stages.2.description: I'm cutting this skin tag off!
Now everyone wants to pet me... Great...
Why do I feel so fragile ? And NO you can’t pet me!
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.0.descri: Finally, I had enough of being petted...
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChinchillaRevertedMemory.stages.2.descri: It feels good not having glass bones!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.0.label: Tiny rodent face
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to eat when my mouth is so small!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.1.label: Tiny rodent face
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.1.description: My face is so tiny and cute!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.2.label: Tiny rodent face
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.0.label: Tiny rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.0.description: Huh... they're kinda cute, I guess.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.1.label: Tiny rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.2.label: Tiny rodent ears
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stages.2.description: Does anyone have a hat I can hide these things under?
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.0.label: Tiny rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.0.description: Well, it *is* a little cool, I guess.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.1.label: Tiny rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.1.description: Awww, it's so tiny! I love it!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.2.label: Tiny rodent tail
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it...
LanguageData.GuineaPigTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: I'm literally being used as a guinea pig!
LanguageData.GuineaPigTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: This is so cool, I might break into squeak!
LanguageData.GuineaPigTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: I don't want to be used for any more experiments!
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: Back to normal. I have my face back!
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: No one calls me cute anymore.
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: Reverted
LanguageData.GuineaPigRevertedMemory.stages.3.descrip: But I liked being cute and fluffy!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.0.label: Guinea pig face
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.0.description: I don't like these chubby cheeks.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.1.label: Guinea pig face
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.1.description: Now everyone wants to give me a boop. I like it!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.2.label: Guinea pig face
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.stages.2.description: How am I supposed to eat with only four teeth?!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.0.label: Guinea pig ears
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.0.description: I guess I can hear a little better.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.1.label: Guinea pig ears
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.2.label: Guinea pig ears
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.stages.2.description: Can't these things stay up at least? They keep folding over.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.0.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.0.description: These paws aren't the worst thing that's happened to me. They're almost useful.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.1.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.1.description: They're so dainty and dextrous, I can do fine work with these.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.2.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigHand.stages.2.description: They're too small and delicate. They look rediculous!
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.0.label: Guinea pig feet
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.1.label: Guinea pig feet
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.1.description: I like these feet. They're cute.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.2.label: Guinea pig feet
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigFoot.stages.2.description: These tiny delicate feet are useless!
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: Became ratmorph
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I feel like a lab rat... literally!
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: Became ratmorph
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: Became ratmorph
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: Am I gonna build a nest in my sleep or something?
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Back to normal! Those teeth were annoying.
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw, but I kind of liked being a rat.
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: I'm never going to eat cheese again!
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I wanted to be a cute rat!
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.0.label: Ratty face
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.0.description: It's too sensitive for my liking. I'm almost overwhelmed with strong smells.
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.1.label: Ratty face
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.1.description: A lot of people say rats are gross, but I think this looks good on me!
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.2.label: Ratty face
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.2.description: I don't want to look like a squeaking PEST!
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.0.label: Rat ears
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.1.label: Rat ears
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.2.label: Rat ears
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.0.label: Rat tail
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.1.label: Rat tail
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.1.description: I wish it was better at something...
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.2.label: Rat tail
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.2.description: I feel dirty and like a thief, like this is a punishment...
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: I'm a... giant bear? What do I even do about this situation?
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: This is awesome, I'm a huge bear-person!
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: No no no! I hate everything about being a hairy bear!
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: This is cool and all, but what about being an even bigger bear with massive clawed paws?
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more hibernating!
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying those giant claws.
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more fur! Oh, skin, how I missed seeing you.
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.0.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.0.description: Table manners are going to be hard like this.
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.1.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.1.description: ROAR! Awesome, time to raid the freezer!
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.2.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.0.label: Bear ears
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.0.description: They're not the worst thing ever. It's like built-in earmuffs.
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.1.label: Bear ears
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.1.description: They're small and round, not all that impressive.
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.2.label: Bear ears
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.2.description: Egh, they're so furry and awful.
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.0.label: Tiny tail
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.0.description: If I had to get a tail, why wasn't it something cool at least?
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.1.label: Tiny tail
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.1.description: As far as tails go, this is not that impressive.
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.2.label: Tiny tail
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.label: Giant paws
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to do anything when I can't grab stuff?
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.1.label: Giant paws
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.1.description: Nice, I can claw people's eyes out!
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.label: Giant paws
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.description: These things are only good for hitting whoever did this to me.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.0.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.1.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.1.descriptio: Nobody will mess with me now!
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.2.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.2.descriptio: I have the most horrible images of wanting to attack everything...
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.0.label: Lizard face
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.1.label: Lizard face
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.1.descriptio: I look like a raptor! Fear me!
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.2.label: Lizard face
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaSnout.stages.2.descriptio: Ew! I have to eat with this gross, scaly thing!
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.0.label: Lizard tail
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.0.description: This thing gets stuck in doors often, but at least it helps with my balance a bit.
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.1.label: Lizard tail
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.1.description: I can use this to whip people like a real lizard! Maybe it will help me swim too...
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.2.label: Lizard tail
LanguageData.EtherLacertiliaTail.stages.2.description: Do lizard tails regrow if I were to get this thing removed?
LanguageData.IguanaTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: No no no... my skin's gotta be here somewhere!
LanguageData.IguanaTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: I just want to lay under the sun and relax.
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: Now the sun just burns... this isn't what I wanted.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.0.label: Spikes
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.0.description: These make it kind of tough to put on shirts and hats, but I'll make do.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.1.label: Spikes
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.1.description: I think I can style these and make a new, unique look for myself!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.2.label: Spikes
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.2.description: These damn things get caught in everything, and it hurts!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.0.label: Snake face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.0.description: Thissss long tounge makesss it hard not to ssssssslur my Sssssss ssssounds...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.1.label: Snake face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.1.description: Sssssharp fangs to match a sssharp tounge.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.2.label: Snake face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.2.description: Sssssstupid tounge tassssting the sssstupid air... Now I have to tassste every rotten sssssmell too.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.0.label: Snake hood
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.0.description: It'sss hard to fit a T-shirt over thissss hood now.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.1.label: Snake hood
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.1.description: How exotic! I could ssscare away any jerks I don't like with thisss.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.2.label: Snake hood
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.0.label: Snake tail
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.0.description: Thissss will take ssssome getting ussssed to.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.1.label: Snake tail
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.1.description: Sssslithering here, sssslithering there, sssslithering everywhere!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.2.label: Snake tail
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: Thessse ssscales are going to take sssome time to get ussssed to... they're kind of itchy.
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: Wow, I feel so quick and powerful like this!
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: MY LEGS! WHERE ARE MY LEGS?!
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: Yessss... but maybe we ssshould sssee just how ssssnakelike I can be...
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Thank goodness, I missed having actual skin.
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: What?! Now I've got these lame human legs again.
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.0.label: Tortoise face
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.1.label: Tortoise face
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.1.descriptio: I look so wise and ancient!
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.2.label: Tortoise face
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeJaw.stages.2.descriptio: I look like I'm 300 years old! I don't want this at all!
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.0.label: Tortoise tail
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.0.descripti: It's short, stubby, and in the way.
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.1.label: Tortoise tail
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.1.descripti: I can wiggle it, but that's about it.
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.2.label: Tortoise tail
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeTail.stages.2.descripti: I have to cut a hole in my pants for THIS?
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.0.label: Half-shell
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.0.descript: Ugh, this thing is pretty awkward. Armored, but heavy.
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.1.label: Half-shell
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.1.descript: It's heavy, but a natural suit of armor, awesome!
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.2.label: Half-shell
LanguageData.EtherTestudinidaeShell.stages.2.descript: So slow and...heavy...and I can't take it off!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: I feel like the world is moving so much faster.
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: I've got natural armor now! I'd like to see raiders try and cut through this!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: I look disgusting and now it takes forever for me to walk anywhere! I don't even like turtles!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: Slow and steady wins the race... Maybe I should take a nap in my shell.
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: That's better! I was starting to feel like I was slowing people down.
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: But being a turtle was so relaxing! I feel so exposed now.
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: Finally! I can once again walk at a reasonable pace!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.0.label: Monkey face
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.0.description: I feel like I need to shave constantly...
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.1.label: Monkey face
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.1.description: This isn't really all that different...
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.2.label: Monkey face
LanguageData.EtherSimianJaw.stages.2.description: I've taken a step *back*! This is terrible!
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.0.label: Monkey ears
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.0.description: My ears...they feel like they're larger.
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.1.label: Monkey ears
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.2.label: Monkey ears
LanguageData.EtherSimianEar.stages.2.description: Why are my ears bigger, that's almost useless!
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.0.label: Monkey tail
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.0.description: Huh...I can pick things up with this tail. Neat.
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.1.label: Monkey tail
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.1.description: It's like another hand. Who needs bionics when you have this?
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.2.label: Monkey tail
LanguageData.EtherSimianTail.stages.2.description: I can feel it moving, and I really don't like the sensation of being able to control it!
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.0.label: Hairy hands
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.0.description: These kinda look like my normal hands...just more primitive.
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.1.label: Hairy hands
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.1.description: I might get good wishes out these monkey paws!
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.2.label: Hairy hands
LanguageData.EtherSimianHand.stages.2.description: My hands! They look weird and old!
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.0.label: Hairy feet
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.0.description: Why can I grab things with my feet?
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.1.label: Hairy feet
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.2.label: Hairy feet
LanguageData.EtherSimianFoot.stages.2.description: Why do my shoes feel so big, and my feet so small?
LanguageData.MonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: Oooh oooh ah ah! I feel closer to my roots.
LanguageData.MonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: It feels like I've gone back three steps in the evolutionary tree!
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I need to shave, I think I'm still hairier than before.
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: I suppose all things must come to an end...
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.0.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.1.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.1.description: Eating veggies has never been better!
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.2.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.2.description: This will go away on its own right...?
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.3.label: Bovid muzzle
LanguageData.EtherBovidMuzzle.stages.3.description: I'll never want for anything but grass ever again!
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.0.label: Bovid ears
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.0.description: I think I can hear the wind through the grass more intensely than before....
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.1.label: Bovid ears
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.1.description: Oh I think I can hear some good grass with these!
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.2.label: Bovid ears
LanguageData.EtherBovidEar.stages.2.description: Hope no one tries to put a tag in these!
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.0.label: Bovid tail
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.0.description: This won't help against megascarabs will it?
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.1.label: Bovid tail
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.1.description: I like feeling it flick back and forth on its own like that!
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.2.label: Bovid tail
LanguageData.EtherBovidTail.stages.2.description: I don't think I'll be able to hide this...
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: Eugh, I feel so heavy all the time. I should diet.
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: It’s gotta feel so good to moo as a cow. Probably feels really good to moo.
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: Please no, I just worked off all that weight! Why!?
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: While this is great, it'd be fun to try the full experience... right? Or maybe I'm not thinking as clearly now...
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Yeah, that was... about enough of that.
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, that was fun though. Still gonna moo for the hell of it.
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.0.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk right with this giant muzzle in the way.
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.1.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.2.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.2.description: I look and sound like a dumb animal!
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.3.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.0.label: Horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.0.description: Well, I guess I'm done wearing hats...
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.1.label: Horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.1.description: You mess with the bull, you get the horns!
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.2.label: Horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.2.description: Maybe I can file them down...would they grow back?
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.description: I regret everything, I don't like this at all.
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.1.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.1.description: Oh, uhm. This is a strange turn of events, I have to think about this for a bit...
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.2.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.3.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.3.description: I mean, it's kind of cool. I feel like a real cow now!
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I can barely see from underneath all this hair.
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: It's like being wrapped in a warm blanket full-time.
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: This is just not natural. My hair is getting everywhere and I can hardly move without it getting stuck in something.
LanguageData.MuffaloTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: It would feel good to get shaved right about now.
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Yeah, that was... about enough of that.
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.MuffaloRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.0.label: Bovine face
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.0.description: My face is hot and fluffy, not a good mix...
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.1.label: Bovine face
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.1.description: I'm so fluffy, and a nice shade of blue!
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.2.label: Bovine face
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.2.description: If I hear "Why so blue?" one more time, I'm going to cry.
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: Honestly, I just feel like a hairy cow.
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: I feel strong enough to carry supplies across the continent.
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: Have I turned into a cow? I think I'm a cow...
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.YakTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: I wish I could be grazing in a field right now.
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Yeah, that was... about enough of that.
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, that was fun though. Still gonna moo for the hell of it.
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.YakRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: I think I'm going to have to stock up on shampoo.
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: Nobody is going to mess with me while I look like this.
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: I've turned into a giant hairy monster!
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.BisonTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: I wish I could be grazing in a field right now.
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Yeah, that was... about enough of that.
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, that was fun though. Still gonna moo for the hell of it.
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BisonRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.0.label: Camelid face
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.0.description: Why do I want a smoke all of a sudden?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.1.label: Camelid face
