LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.1.description: I'll look so classy with a cigar!
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.2.label: Camelid face
LanguageData.EtherCamelidMuzzle.stages.2.description: My lips are so swollen, did I get stung by a bee?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.0.label: camelid ears
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.0.description: What am I supposed to do with these?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.1.label: camelid ears
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.2.label: camelid ears
LanguageData.EtherCamelidEar.stages.2.description: These things are so twitchy, get them off me!
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.0.label: Camelid tail
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.0.description: What is this useful for again?
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.1.label: Camelid tail
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.1.description: Look at it back there! So cute!
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.2.label: Camelid tail
LanguageData.EtherCamelidTail.stages.2.description: Can't keep it still even if I wanted to!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: I'm covered in wool, and I really want to spit at people.
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: Wow, I'm covered in wool, and these hooves are cool!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: I never asked to become a stupid, smelly alpaca! I need to shave right now!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: Wow. This wool is so fluffy, imagine being on all four hooves like this!
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more wool.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: Aw man, but I was really enjoying threatening to spit at people.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.2.descriptio: No more wool! Oh, skin, how I missed seeing you.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.0.label: Wooly snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.0.description: Ew, I feel like I need to spit.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.1.label: Wooly snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.2.label: Wooly snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.2.description: My face, it's so ugly and drooly!
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.0.label: Wooly ears
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.0.description: They're annoyingly long and get in the way.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.1.label: Wooly ears
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.2.label: Wooly ears
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.0.label: Wooly tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.0.description: It's dangly and in the way.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.1.label: Wooly tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.1.description: Cool, a tail! I suppose it's part of the aesthetic, if not all that useful.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.2.label: Wooly tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.2.description: I think I can cut it off, right?
LanguageData.DromedaryTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: I guess I can now live in a desert...
LanguageData.DromedaryTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: Now I can live for two weeks without water!
LanguageData.DromedaryTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: What the hell is wrong with my mouth? So much salvia...
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I’m not gonna miss that hump!
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: I’m gonna miss being able to get away with spitting at people.
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.DromedaryRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: Finally, I’m as vulnerable to dehydration as nature intended!
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: Even my meal trays look delicious now...
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.GoatTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I'm still on two legs, so I'm not truly the GOAT.
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I can speak without a bleat now, thankfully.
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: But I wanted to be the goat!
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Thank Randy, I no longer smell terrible all the time.
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.GoatRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I REALLY wanted to be the goat!
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: At least my head is safe!
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: I feel great! No one’s going to mess with these horns of mine!
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.IbexTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: My head’s so heavy and my neck is killing me!
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: So I lost a killer rack, at least I can wear fresh shirts now!
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I miss headbutting my problems already...
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.IbexRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: My head feels ligher now! I will not miss those horns!
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.0.label: Goat face
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.0.description: This isn't what I was planning to wake up to this morning...
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.1.label: Goat face
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.1.description: Maaah! I want to ram something!
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.2.label: Goat face
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.2.description: My face...what's wrong with my face!?
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.0.label: Goat ears
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.0.description: At least I can hear a bit better...
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.1.label: Goat ears
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.1.description: I can hear echoes so well now!
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.2.label: Goat ears
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.2.description: If anyone mentions the story about the goats and that bridge, they're a dead man!
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.0.label: Goat tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.0.description: What? What tail? I can't see it!
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.1.label: Goat tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.2.label: Goat tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it...
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: Ugh, that's a lot of hair. Where's the shears — er, I mean, razor?
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: I'm shedding everywhere, this is disgusting.
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: Hmmm... I wonder how much more sheeplike I could baaaah?
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Ha, no more shearings for me!
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Thank Randy, I no longer smell like wet hair all the time.
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Aw, I wanted to be more sheepish, not less.
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.0.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.0.description: Baaaaaaaa? I don't really want to eat grass...
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.1.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.1.description: Who needs a lawnmower when you could just do it yourself?
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.2.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.3.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.3.description: I don't need to be able to cook when I could just eat grass!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.0.label: Sheep eye
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.1.label: Sheep eye
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.1.description: Nobody can sneak up on me now...!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.2.label: Sheep eye
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.2.description: They make me look like a stupid sheep!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.0.label: Sheep ear
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.0.description: They are really annoying sometimes, blocking my vision flopping around.
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.1.label: Sheep ear
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.2.label: Sheep ear
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.2.description: I look like I belong in a cage...
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.0.label: Sheep tail
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.1.label: Sheep tail
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.2.label: Sheep tail
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.2.description: This is too weird for me, but at least I can hide it from people.
LanguageData.CaribouTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: Well at least I won’t get cold in the winter...
LanguageData.CaribouTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I can’t wait to see the shape of my antlers!
LanguageData.CaribouTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: They would not leave me outside in winter, would they?
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Much better, these antlers were pretty heavy...
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I feel defenseless without my antlers...
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CaribouRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: Finally, I had enough of sowing these antlers!
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.0.label: Reindeer face
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.0.description: Oh deer, this is going to be tough to get used to.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.1.label: Reindeer face
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.2.label: Reindeer face
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.2.description: STOP SINGING JINGLE BELLS TO ME!
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.0.label: Reindeer ears
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.0.description: At least they keep the flies off themselves...?
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.1.label: Reindeer ears
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.2.label: Reindeer ears
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stages.2.description: These things are so twitchy, get them off me!
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.0.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.1.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.2.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.stages.2.description: Just big enough to be hard to hide... great...
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.0.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.1.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.2.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stages.2.description: Just big enough to be hard to hide... great...
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: Great, now I look like a big, shaggy lump.
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: I feel so majestic, so imposing. This is awesome!
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: An elk? Isn't that just a big deer? Oh I don't care! Just make it stop!
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: Became elk morph
LanguageData.ElkTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: A good start, how far can I go?
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Oh the humanity! MY humanity! Yay!
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: Reverted
LanguageData.ElkRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I was so close to perfection...
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.0.label: Elk face
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.0.description: I can barely talk with this thing...
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.1.label: Elk face
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stages.2.label: Elk face
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.0.label: Elk ears
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.1.label: Elk ears
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.1.description: I can hear so well now!
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.2.label: Elk ears
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.2.description: These things are so twitchy, get them off me!
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.0.label: Elk tail
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.0.description: Is this stubby little thing...a tail?
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.1.label: Elk tail
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.2.label: Elk tail
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it.
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.0.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to rest on my pillow?
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.1.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.2.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.2.description: These things are horrible. I'm so top heavy now I can hardly walk in a straight line.
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.3.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stages.3.description: With these, I'd be right at home in the forest.
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: Eugh... I smell like chemfuel. Not liking this so far.
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: It's a little weird, but I bet I could get used to these changes! Boom!
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: Eugh! I reek of chemfuel, and I feel like I could explode at any moment!
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: Not bad... but it'd be fun to have four hooves on the ground... right?
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more chemfuel!
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: Aw man, but I was really enjoying the petrol smell.
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: No more hooves! Hands, glorious hands!
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.3.descrip: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.0.label: Petrol snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.0.description: Perfect for one thing, eating grass.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.1.label: Petrol snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.2.label: Petrol snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.2.description: No, I don't want to eat grass, stop thinking about it!
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.0.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.0.description: My ears? What do you mean something is wrong with my ears?
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.1.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.2.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.0.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.1.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.1.description: Okay, this is a bit too weird, even for me.
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.2.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.2.description: This is...oh no, this is chemfuel...oh no no no...this can't be happening!
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.3.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.3.description: I don't see the problem with this, especially if I'm going to be the full thing.
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: All the sounds are so loud, and kind of scary! AAH, was that you? Who's there?
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: I feel so graceful, like the ruler of the forest.
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: AAH! Who was that!? I heard you! Run away! I hate this!
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: So regal! This is great, but not quite all there yet.
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm not so jumpy all the time now, phew.
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I could have had some nice antlers...
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: I'm sorry for being so scared all the time, everyone!
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.0.label: Deer face
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.0.description: Look at my nose, it's just so...animal.
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.1.label: Deer face
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.2.label: Deer face
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.2.description: I could really use some buckshot right now.
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.0.label: Deer ears
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.0.description: Any noise causes them to flick up...
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.1.label: Deer ears
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.1.description: I can hear predators so easily now...uh, I mean, raiders!
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.2.label: Deer ears
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.0.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.0.description: It'd be nice if it didn't flick up whenever people scare me...
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.1.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.2.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.0.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.0.description: They would be fine if they weren't constantly getting stuck in door frames.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.1.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.1.description: This is awesome! I feel like I could just ram into things and destroy them!
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.2.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.2.description: This is ridiculous! How am I supposed to even get on shirts now?
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.3.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.3.description: Closer to the forest, and closer to my dream.
LanguageData.GazelleTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: What was that? Nothing? Better keep watching just in case...
LanguageData.GazelleTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: Wow! I’m so fast and graceful!
LanguageData.GazelleTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I’m scared all the time and I can’t change my shirt! I hate it!
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Maybe now I won’t need to run anymore?
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I miss the thrill! Everything’s dull and drab now!
LanguageData.GazelleRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.0.label: Gazelle face
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.0.description: It's long, but it's got an interesting marking at least...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.1.label: Gazelle face
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.1.description: So cool! Give me that grass!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.2.label: Gazelle face
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.0.label: Gazelle ears
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.0.description: Why do they have to have interesting markings? I'm so going to get shot by a raider.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.1.label: Gazelle ears
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.1.description: Cooler! I can hear everything! Even the grass growing!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.2.label: Gazelle ears
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.2.description: I'm going to get skinned for these...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.0.label: Little tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.0.description: It's fine, I guess, and easy enough to hide.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.1.label: Little tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.2.label: Little tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.2.description: Why do even need this tail...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.0.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.0.description: Hope I won’t have to use these!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.1.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.2.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stages.2.description: They are all I get to defend myself with?!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: My dentist isn't going to be happy about this.
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: Nobody will mess with me now, not with tusks like these!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: I'm a hideous pig! And these tusks are a nightmare to floss!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: This is great, but what if I could go further and root around for truffles?
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more snuffling!
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying those tusks.
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more trotters! Hands, glorious hands!
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I don't want to be a damn pig!
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: Wow, rolling in mud is so much nicer than I thought.
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: I don't want to be a filthy hog!
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Yeah, I think I'll try a diet now.
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, it was good to be the big pig.
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.0.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.0.description: Not sure if it's practical but I'll make it work.
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.1.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.1.description: My mule is the cutest thing I've ever seen!
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.2.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.2.description: I don't want to have a long face!
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.3.label: Equine face
LanguageData.EtherEquineMuzzle.stages.3.description: I'll never want for anything but grass ever again!
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.0.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.1.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.1.description: The only advantage I need is the cool factor!
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.2.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.2.description: How will I wear hats with these?!
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.3.label: Equine ears
LanguageData.EtherEquineEar.stages.3.description: I'm sure they'll let me hear anyone creeping up on me!
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.0.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.0.description: It doesn't get in the way at least.
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.1.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.2.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.2.description: No this isn't right at all!
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.3.label: Equine tail
LanguageData.EtherEquineTail.stages.3.description: It's a natural part of me now!
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: I'm feeling really stubborn, and I don't want to talk to you!
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: My back has never been stronger!
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: This is awesome, I want to try pulling a cart like this.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I can speak properly again... phew.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: I feel so weak and feeble.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: Aw, but I liked being that way.
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: I feel like galloping across a steppe.
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: Gaze in awe upon me and my glorious mane!
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: My throat feels so hoarse right now. Wait...
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: This is awesome, but I wonder what it would feel like to gallop on all fours.
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Finally, maybe all those flies will finally leave me alone.
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: No! My glorious mane! It's gone!
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Phew, I was sure I was bound for the glue factory soon.
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Aw, I can't even gallop now.
LanguageData.EtherReactionChaosTF.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.EtherReactionChaosTF.stages.1.label: feeling chaotic
LanguageData.EtherReactionChaosTF.stages.1.descriptio: My whole body is warping before my eyes! Am I going to survive?!
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboAmbient.stages.0.label: saw neutral chaothrumbo
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboAmbient.stages.0.description: It's a little terrifying, but it's not coming after us.
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboAmbient.stages.1.label: saw allied chaothrumbo
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboAmbient.stages.1.description: It's on our side, we're practically unstoppable.
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboAmbient.stages.2.label: saw enemy chaothrumbo
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboAmbient.stages.2.description: Oh gods, it's huge! How in the hell do we stop that thing?!
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.0.label: transformed
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.0.descriptio: I...I'm a massive, unnatural creature...this is going to take some time to get used to.
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.1.label: transformed
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.1.descriptio: I'm a massive, hulking mountain of flesh and fur and horns...I feel so powerful!
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.2.label: transformed
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.2.descriptio: I'm a massive, hulking pile of flesh and fur and horns...this is horrific...I want to be my old self again, please!
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.3.label: Bow before me!
LanguageData.PM_CThrumboTfThought.stages.3.descriptio: I'm a massive, hulking titan of flesh and fur and horns...this is the best thing that's ever happened to me!
LanguageData.PMFormerHumanAccepted_VeryClose.stages.0: A close relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help. I'm glad we took them in.
LanguageData.PMFormerHumanAccepted_Close.stages.0.des: A close relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help. I'm glad we took them in.
A relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help. I'm glad we took them in.
LanguageData.PMFormerHumanAccepted_Distant.stages.0.d: A distant relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help. I'm glad we took them in.
LanguageData.PMFormerHumanRejected_VeryClose.stages.0: A close relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help, but the colony just left them out in the wild!
LanguageData.PMFormerHumanRejected_Close.stages.0.des: A close relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help, but the colony just left them out in the wild.
A relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help, but the colony rejected them.
LanguageData.PMFormerHumanRejected_Distant.stages.0.d: A distant relative of mine was turned into an animal and came to us for help, but the colony rejected them.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.0.label: Thick hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.0.description: My skin feels like hard leather, it's a little uncomfortable.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.1.label: Thick hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.1.description: Nobody will be able to hurt me like this! Except emotionally...
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.2.label: Thick hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.2.description: Eww, it's so dense and wrinkled, like a giant callous...
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.0.label: Scales
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.0.description: I wish I didn't ssssshed sssso much...
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.1.label: Scales
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.2.label: Scales
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.2.description: They're coarse and rough and irritating and they're EVERYWHERE!!!
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.0.label: Cold blooded
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.0.description: I just can't ever get myself warm enough.
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.1.label: Cold blooded
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.1.description: Nothing feels quite like sunning myself on a warm rock.
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.2.label: Cold blooded
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.2.description: I'm freaking c-c-c-cold all the time now!
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.0.label: Feathers
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.0.description: They're itchy as hell and get in the way of clothes...
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.1.label: Feathers
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.1.description: I could preen them all day.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.2.label: Feathers
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.2.description: I keep pulling them out but they keep regrowing! They're so itchy, aaghhh!
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to do anything with wings for arms?!
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.1.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.1.description: Wait, I can't fly with these, AND I lose my hands...? I'm starting to rethink this now...
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.2.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.2.description: Why, Randy, why?! I'm completely useless without my arms!
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.0.label: Talons
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.0.description: They're so...animal, and I leave scratches on wooden floors.
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.1.label: Talons
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.1.description: I can be really quick on these, and maybe do some damage!
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.2.label: Talons
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.0.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.0.description: It's not too different, I suppose I can get used to standing on it.
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.1.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.1.description: They're so soft, and I can run barefoot on gravel!
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.2.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.2.description: No no no, I want my regular, non-animal feet back!
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.3.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.3.description: They look just like an animal's feet, this is exactly what I want!
LanguageData.PM_JeleausThought.stages.0.label: jealous non-morph
LanguageData.PM_JeleausThought.stages.0.description: Other people are mutated and I'm not yet. It's not fair!
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.0.label: paw-hands
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to do anything with paws for hands?
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.1.label: paw-hands
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.1.description: Sure they're not as flexible...but they're cute. That's all that matters, right?
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.2.label: paw-hands
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.2.description: Not my hands, not my damned hands!
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.0.label: hoof-hands
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.0.description: I can't do anything with hooves!
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.1.label: hoof-hands
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.1.description: They're kinda cool. Useless, but cool?
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.2.label: hoof-hands
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.2.description: They're horrific and beastly, I'm useless!
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.0.label: stump-hands
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.1.label: stump-hands
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.1.description: I will smash through every wall there is.
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.2.label: stump-hands
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.2.description: I can't even pat a dog without hurting it!
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.0.label: wing tip-hands
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.0.description: I don't have any fingers, what am I supposed to do?!
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.1.label: wing tip-hands
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.1.description: Flap flap. Flap flap. They are admittedly difficult to work with.
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.2.label: wing tip-hands
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.0.label: Fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.0.description: People aren't supposed to have fur.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.1.label: Fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.2.label: Fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.2.description: I'm too hot like this, and I don't like how animal it makes me look!
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.0.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to use these things?
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.1.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.1.description: Okay sure, they might not be practical for lifting things, or flying, or really anything I guess; but they do allow me to do an even better imitation of a dodo!
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.2.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.2.description: How am I supposed to do anything with wings? They don't even let me fly!
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.0.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.0.description: Not hooves, what am I meant to do with these?!
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.1.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.1.description: Hm. Well, I can't say it was unexpected...
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.2.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.3.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.3.description: One step closer to all fours. This is great!
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.0.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.0.description: Are they bent a different way, or is that my heel?
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.1.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.1.description: I can be so much faster like this! Once I get used to it.
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.2.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.2.description: My knee's bending backwards now! What? That's my heel, not my knee? Even worse!
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.3.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.3.description: Just a bit further, and I won't be able to stand up! How about that?
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.0.label: Paws for feet
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.0.description: Well, at least I won't have a problem walking over gravel.
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.1.label: Paws for feet
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.1.description: Look at my cute little paws!
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.2.label: Paws for feet
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.2.description: Wait, whats happened to my feet? They look like a beasts!
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.0.label: Avian claw-feet
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.0.description: It's a bit wierd walking around on chicken-feet.
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.1.label: Avian claw-feet
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.1.description: I am suprised just how nimble these avian claws are, I haven't missed a step!
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.2.label: Avian claw-feet
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.2.description: My feet look like a chickens. I wonder if I'm starting to taste like one too?
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.0.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.0.description: Well, at least I don't need shoes anymore.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.1.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.2.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.2.description: I can't even sneak away from the humiliation anymore... these things cause a racket wherever I go!
LanguageData.EtherWooly.stages.0.label: Wool
LanguageData.EtherWooly.stages.1.label: Wool
LanguageData.EtherWooly.stages.2.label: Wool
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.0.label: Heavy fur
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.1.label: Heavy fur
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.1.description: A thick pelt, for soft hugs.
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.2.label: Heavy fur
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.2.description: It's unbearably hot under this hideous pelt!
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stages.0.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stages.0.description: What the, where are my ears?
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stages.1.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stages.1.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stages.2.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stages.2.description: My ears?! This is a nightmare! I look like a monster!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.0.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.0.description: How is this even possible? It feels so weird...
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.1.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.1.description: This is taking it too far. People weren't meant to lay eggs!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.2.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.2.description: How!? Why!? What has become of me!?
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.3.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.3.description: I know I wanted this, but I'm not entirely sure now.
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.0.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.1.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.2.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.3.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.4.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.0.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.1.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.2.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.3.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.4.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.0.d: I'm not sure whether this is better or worse for them, but at least they're better equipped to survive.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.1.d: A colonist was turned into an animal. That's not right.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.2.d: We turned a captive into an animal. I know they're our prisoner, but it seems wrong.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.3.d: Someone came to our colony, and we betrayed that trust.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.4.d: A slave became an animal. They may be a slave, but this feels so wrong.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.5.d: This is bad to turn a prisonner into an animal, but I also feel like they deserved it.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.0.label: wild pawn merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.0.descriptio: I really don't think they appreciated that at all.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.1.label: colonist merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.1.descriptio: We did mad science on one of our own, and now they're...horrifying.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.2.label: prisoner merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.2.descriptio: We did mad science on a captive. It's wrong to make them into a monster.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.3.label: guest merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.3.descriptio: Someone came to our colony for hospitality, and now they're an abomination.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.4.label: slave guest
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.4.descriptio: Being a slave does not mean it's ok to become a freak.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.5.label: guilty prisoner guest
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.5.descriptio: While it must be painful, I do not feel bad for them.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.0.des: A wild person is human again. We did a good deed.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.1.des: A colonist is human again. We did a good deed.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.2.des: At least it can be undone.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.3.des: A guest is human again. Hopefully they'll trust us again, eventually.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.4.des: They are at least freed from animality.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.5.des: This is good for them, I guess?
LanguageData.DefaultPermanentlyFeralReaction.stages.1: We knew it was coming...but now they can never be human again.
LanguageData.DefaultPermanentlyFeralReaction.stages.2: Did we really expect to turn them back?
LanguageData.DefaultPermanentlyFeralReaction.stages.4: Let's wish they can be free in nature.
LanguageData.DefaultPermanentlyFeralReaction.stages.5: I guess this is a punishment for their crimes.
LanguageData.FriendMergedThought.stages.0.label: friend merged
LanguageData.FriendMergedThought.stages.0.description: The colony did mad science on my friend and now they're a monster!
LanguageData.RivalMergedThought.stages.0.label: rival merged
LanguageData.RivalMergedThought.stages.0.description: We did mad science on my rival. Serves them right.
LanguageData.FriendPermFeralThought.stages.0.label: friend permanently feral
LanguageData.FriendPermFeralThought.stages.0.descript: My friend is stuck in the body of an animal...forever!
LanguageData.RivalPermFeralThought.stages.0.label: rival permanently feral
LanguageData.RivalPermFeralThought.stages.0.descripti: My rival can never come back from that beastly form now. It suits them.
LanguageData.FriendRevertedThought.stages.0.label: friend reverted
LanguageData.FriendRevertedThought.stages.0.descripti: My friend is human again! Praise Randy!
LanguageData.RivalRevertedThought.stages.0.label: rival reverted
LanguageData.RivalRevertedThought.stages.0.descriptio: Agh, it was somewhat fun seeing them on all-fours though!
LanguageData.RivalTransformedThought.stages.0.label: transformed rival
LanguageData.RivalTransformedThought.stages.0.descrip: My rival is on all fours. Serves them right! I think I like them better like this.
LanguageData.FriendTransformedThought.stages.0.label: transformed friend
LanguageData.FriendTransformedThought.stages.0.descri: My friend turned into a dumb animal!
LanguageData.FatherTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed father
LanguageData.FatherTransformed.stages.0.description: My dad is an animal...I don't know how to feel about this.
LanguageData.MotherTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed mother
LanguageData.MotherTransformed.stages.0.description: My poor mother is nothing but an animal now...
LanguageData.HusbandTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed husband
LanguageData.HusbandTransformed.stages.0.description: My husband was turned into an animal! He's not sleeping in my bed like that.
LanguageData.WifeTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed wife
LanguageData.WifeTransformed.stages.0.description: My wife was turned into an animal! Guess I'll have to find somewhere else to sleep.
LanguageData.BrotherTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed brother
LanguageData.BrotherTransformed.stages.0.description: My brother was transformed into an animal! This is like that weird movie...
LanguageData.SisterTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed sister
LanguageData.SisterTransformed.stages.0.description: My sister was turned into an animal! It should have been me instead...
LanguageData.SonTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed son
LanguageData.SonTransformed.stages.0.description: My son was turned into an animal! My poor boy...
LanguageData.DaughterTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed daughter
LanguageData.DaughterTransformed.stages.0.description: My daughter was turned into an animal! My darling girl...
LanguageData.FriendTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed friend
LanguageData.FriendTransformed.stages.0.description: My friend turned into a dumb animal!
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMutated.stages.0.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMutated.stages.0.descripti: My body is tainted by grotesque mutations.
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMutated.stages.1.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMutated.stages.1.descripti: I shouldn't be as carefree about these changes as I am.
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMutated.stages.2.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMutated.stages.2.descripti: These abhorrent mutations are an unholy stain on my humanity!
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMutated.stages.0.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMutated.stages.0.descrip: I feel closer to nature with these mutations.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMutated.stages.1.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMutated.stages.1.descrip: I am one with nature. I feel intimately connected with the world around me like this.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMutated.stages.2.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMutated.stages.2.descrip: As much as I feel tainted by them, I am more connected to nature with these changes.
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMutated.stages.0.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMutated.stages.0.descript: I feel less than human like this.
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMutated.stages.1.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMutated.stages.1.descript: I shouldn't be as carefree about these changes as I am.
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMutated.stages.2.label: mutated
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMutated.stages.2.descript: I am stained by the tarnish of animalism on my human form.
LanguageData.PM_GainedVeneratedMutation.stages.1.desc: If I change enough, will people venerate me?.
LanguageData.PM_GainedVeneratedMutation.stages.2.desc: I venerate them, I don't necessarily want to *be* them!
LanguageData.PM_GainedVeneratedMutation.stages.3.desc: When I change enough, people will venerate *me*.
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristTransformed.stages.0.label: purist transformed
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristTransformed.stages.0.descr: My pure body is permanently stained by this horrific transformation!
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristTransformed.stages.1.label: purist transformed
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristTransformed.stages.1.descr: I feel so different. Can I still be pure like this? Surely not...
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristTransformed.stages.2.label: purist transformed
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyTransformed.stages.0.des: A little on the extreme side, but if this is what must be done for nature to be prime, then I am all for it.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyTransformed.stages.1.des: I am more than one with nature, I *am* nature.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyTransformed.stages.2.des: Sure, I'm part of nature now, but what if nature thinks we're impostors? I'm not sold...
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyTransformed.stages.0.desc: Well, there go my weekend plans for BEING A PURE HUMAN BEING.
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyTransformed.stages.1.desc: I feel so very different. I'm surely impure like this.
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyTransformed.stages.2.desc: I am a HUMAN BEING, not an animal, this is the unholiest thing I can imagine.
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristReverted.stages.0.label: purist reverted
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristReverted.stages.0.descript: Their flesh is restored. They are once again clean.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyReverted.stages.0.label: naturist reverted
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyReverted.stages.0.descri: But at last I felt closer to nature...
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyReverted.stages.0.label: primist reverted
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyReverted.stages.0.descrip: Humanity can conquer any adversity, including not being human. Checkmate, nature.
LanguageData.PM_VeneratedAnimalReverted.stages.0.desc: It might be for the best, but having more {ANIMALKIND}s around was nice.
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMorphed.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.PM_FleshPuristMorphed.stages.0.descripti: My body is cursed and animalistic.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMorphed.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMorphed.stages.0.descrip: My body is a temple to nature.
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMorphed.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.PM_HumanPrimacyMorphed.stages.0.descript: My body is cursed and animalistic.
LanguageData.PM_VeneratedAnimalMorphed.stages.0.label: venerated {ANIMALKIND} morph
LanguageData.PM_VeneratedAnimalMorphed.stages.0.descr: I am blessed to become closer to the wonderful {ANIMALKIND}.
LanguageData.PM_NaturePrimacyMorphedReverted.stages.0: I am no longer a holy middle point between human and nature.
LanguageData.PM_VeneratedAnimalMorphedReverted.stages: I could have had a higher social status for that...
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.0.label: witnessed ally transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.0.description: It's still them, but the change is slightly offputting.
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.1.label: witnessed ally transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.1.description: Yes, another one to join us...
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.2.label: witnessed ally transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.2.description: That was horrific to watch, we're doing these insane experiments on our own people!
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.3.label: witnessed ally transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedAllyTf.stages.3.description: God I wish that were me.
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.0.label: witnessed outsider transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.1.label: witnessed outsider transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.1.descripti: I'm glad outsiders are so open to becoming animals.
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.2.label: witnessed outsider transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.2.descripti: That was horrific to watch, doing insane experiments on people!
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.3.label: witnessed outsider transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedNonAllyTf.stages.3.descripti: God I wish that were me!
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.0.label: witnessed rival transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.0.description: As bad as it sounds, it was theraputic to see it.
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.1.label: witnessed rival transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.1.description: People I don't like shouldn't get to experience it.
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.2.label: witnessed rival transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.2.description: However horrific it is to watch, I feel like they deserve it.
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.3.label: witnessed rival transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedRivalTf.stages.3.description: Why do they get all the fun?!
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.0.label: witnessed friend transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.0.descriptio: My friend, subjected to that horrible change...
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.1.label: witnessed friend transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.1.descriptio: Good for them, I hope they enjoy themselves!
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.2.label: witnessed friend transformation
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.2.descriptio: That was absolutely horrific! A person I've known for so long becoming something they're not!
LanguageData.PM_WitnessedFriendTf.stages.3.label: witnessed friend transformation
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.0.label: body purist squeamish
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.1.label: body purist disgusted
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.2.label: body purist violated
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.2.descripti: I feel grossed out looking at the changes! No more, please!
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.3.label: body purist horrified
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.3.descripti: I feel sick in my own skin. I want to be human again.
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.4.label: body purist nightmare
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.4.descripti: I look hardly anything like my old self, I'm terrfied!
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.5.label: mutated abomination
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.5.descripti: There is nothing human left of me. I am an abomination.
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.0.label: changed (none)
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.0.descr: I have am neither bonded or broken
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.1.label: changed (broken)
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.2.label: changed (bonded)
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.0.label: permanently feral
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.0.description: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH I'M A DOG FOREVER (also you should never see this thought)
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.1.label: was a wild animal
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.1.description: I was trapped as a beast, mindless and feral! I'm human again, but I don't think I'll get over this for a long time.
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.2.label: was a sapient animal
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.2.description: I'm glad to be human again. I didn't know what to do as a beast...and I can still feel the instincts tugging at my mind.
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.3.label: was a mad animal
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.3.description: I'm sorry...I couldn't control myself from the blind rage! You'd feel it too if you went through what I did.
LanguageData.WasAnimalPrimalWish.stages.0.label: no longer an animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalPrimalWish.stages.0.description: I'm human again? But c'mon, that wa awesome! Put me back in, coach!
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.0.label: permanently feral
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.0.description: I shouldn't have this thought, but it was exhilarating to know I'd never turn back.
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.1.label: was a wild animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.1.description: I was trapped as a beast, mindless and feral! I'm human again, but the experience was...not as bad as I thought?
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.2.label: was a sapient animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.2.description: I'm glad to be human again. I didn't know what to do as a beast, but it did give me some valuable perspective.
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.3.label: was a mad animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.3.description: Wow, it felt great to let out all my anger like that!
LanguageData.MyMergeMateDied.stages.0.label: my meldmate {0} died
LanguageData.MyMergeMateDied.stages.0.description: My meldmate died. It feels a bit like dying myself.
LanguageData.KilledMyMergeMate.stages.0.label: killed my meldmate
LanguageData.SoldMyMergeMate.stages.0.label: meldmate sold
LanguageData.SoldMyMergeMate.stages.0.description: My other half was sold to a trader! It was like I was sold too!
LanguageData.MyExMergeDied.stages.0.label: ex-meld {0} died
LanguageData.MyExMergeDied.stages.0.description: The person I was melded to died. It feels sort of good that my darkest secrets are now only mine.
LanguageData.KilledMyExMerge.stages.0.label: killed my ex-meld
LanguageData.SoldMyExMerge.stages.0.label: ex-meld sold
LanguageData.SoldMyExMerge.stages.0.description: We're better off apart, with all that we know about each other.
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.0.label: was melded and permanently feral
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.0.description: This thought should like, never happen.
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.1.label: was melded and feral
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.1.description: It was surreal...I was merged with another person and left with the combined minds of two animals. I feel like we know each other better.
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.2.label: was melded and sapient
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.2.description: I'm glad to be human again, yet I have to say the experience was enlightening. I feel closer to my meldmate than ever!
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.3.label: was melded and mad
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.3.description: It felt great to let out all that anger with another person!
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.0.label: was melded and permanently feral
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.0.description: This thought should like, never happen.
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.1.label: was melded and feral
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.1.description: I was trapped as a beast in the same body as another! It was horribly uncomfortable to forget my humanity and I can't look them in the eyes for the things they made us do!
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.2.label: was a sapient animal
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.2.description: I was trapped in the body of a beast with another person right next to me! I knew what they were thinking and they knew everything about me. I'm almost traumatised!
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.3.label: was a mad animal
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.3.description: I'm sorry! It was the other guy, I swear!
LanguageData.ExoticProduced.stages.0.label: produced
LanguageData.ExoticProducedBond.stages.0.label: produced
LanguageData.ExoticProducedBroken.stages.0.label: produced
LanguageData.MorphAteAnimalMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate kin-animal
LanguageData.MorphAteAnimalMeatDirect.stages.0.descri: I ate the raw flesh of an animal that I look a lot like I do now...
I ate meat from an animal that looked a lot like I do now...
LanguageData.WargMorphAteCorpse.stages.0.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.WargMorphAteCorpse.stages.0.description: I gave in to my beastly thoughts and ate the raw corpse of a fresh kill. Eugh.
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate chaomeat
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatDirect.stages.0.description: It's slimy, raw meat...and didn't these things used to be human?!
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.label: ate chaomeat
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.descrip: It tastes alright, but didn't these things used to be human?!
LanguageData.FurryNoMutations.stages.0.label: morph frustrated
LanguageData.FurryNoMutations.stages.0.description: The human genome is so simple, and I could be so much more.
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.1.desc: I'm already looking great, can't wait for more!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.2.desc: This is so cool. My dream is coming true!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.3.desc: From my head to my toes, I can feel the changes all over. This is incredible!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.4.desc: I'm a beastly freak... and I love it!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.5.desc: I knew life was better on the wild side. This is the best thing ever!
LanguageData.ProductiveBliss.stages.0.label: productive bliss
LanguageData.LaidEgg.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.LaidEgg.stages.0.description: This is humiliating...and it doesn't feel like it'll be the last.
LanguageData.LaidEggMale.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.LaidEggMale.stages.0.description: This is humiliating...how does this even work?
LanguageData.LaidEggBond.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.LaidEggBroken.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.MilkedMyself.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.MilkedMyselfMale.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.MilkedMyselfBond.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.MilkedMyselfBroken.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.ChemMilkedMyself.stages.0.label: drained my chemcyst
LanguageData.ChemMilkedMyselfBond.stages.0.label: drained my chemcyst
LanguageData.ChemMilkedMyselfBroken.stages.0.label: drained my chemcyst
LanguageData.ShavedMyself.stages.0.label: shaved myself
LanguageData.ShavedMyself.stages.0.description: That was a lot of hair. I hope this ends soon.
LanguageData.ShavedMyselfBond.stages.0.label: clean shaven
LanguageData.ShavedMyselfBond.stages.0.description: It's weird, but it feels kinda good to shave all that wool off.
LanguageData.ShavedMyselfBroken.stages.0.label: shaved myself... again
LanguageData.FoundTruffles.stages.0.label: found truffles
LanguageData.FoundTruffles.stages.0.description: I managed to find some food while sniffing around in the dirt. Kinda dirty, but tasty.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtVeneratedAnimal.stag: A bit extreme, but at least I feel safe like this around my fellow ideoligion members.
Everyone likes me, they really like me! Not sure why I should care about being like this...
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMAVeneratedAnimal.st: Look at me, I am venerated now.
More patting, yes. It just feels right.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBPVeneratedAnimal.st: Venerate me all you want you twisted weirdos, I just want to be human again.
Ugh, I can hear the whispered thoughts of instinct nibbling at my brain. And stop patting me!
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPWVeneratedAnimal.st: I am your god now, and I want nothing less than the respect I deserve.
I am your god, so give me pats and treats.
LanguageData.AnimalisticWargMorphAteCorpse.stages.0.d: Ugh, this is disgusting. I don't want to do this...
LanguageData.AnimalisticWargMorphAteCorpse.stages.1.d: Ugh, this isn't the best meal ever...but it's tasty.
LanguageData.AnimalisticWargMorphAteCorpse.stages.2.d: Something wants me to like the taste...and I think I do.
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.0.descr: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. We're not animals.
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.1.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.1.descr: It's alright...still gross, but it's more tolerable than before.
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.2.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.2.descr: Hm...it's decent...it's just hard to think normally when I'm eating it...
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.3.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.1.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.1.descriptio: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.2.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.2.descriptio: I ate animal feed, and it was...alright? That should concern me.
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.3.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.1.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.2.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.2.descript: Why do I feel weird out and about? Oh! Clothes!
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.3.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.4.label: naked
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.0.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.0.descriptio: I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.1.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.1.descriptio: Nothin' between me and the world, it's just right.
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.2.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.3.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.3.descriptio: Why would they want to put stuff over their fur...
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.4.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1.de: My head feels weird...it's like a strange voice in the back of my mind.
LanguageData.AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2.de: I think I should just...get on all fours.
LanguageData.AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.3.de: Should I...give in to the thoughts?
LanguageData.MA_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.0: My human mind is as strong as ever!
LanguageData.MA_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1: A gentle tug at my mind, telling me to let go. It's tempting.
LanguageData.MA_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2: I think these mutations are...starting to get the better of my mind.
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.0: My human mind is as strong as ever!
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1: Why do I feel so strange? Like my mind is melting...
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2: These sights and smells are overwhelming and horrid!
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.3: No! I can't...give up now...but this instinct is strong!
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.0: My human mind is as strong as ever...which is boring.
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1: My senses feel keener, and these animal thoughts are electric!
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2: Everything is so rich...a new experience...I could get used to this...!
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.3: Hard to keep my focus...but why should I?
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.0.label: no herd
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind. I feel so unsafe being all alone.
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.1.label: small herd
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small herd. I still don't feel very safe.
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.2.label: decent herd
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.2.description: There's a decent number of people in my herd. Safety in numbers!
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.3.label: huge herd
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my herd. There's nothing to fear!
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.0.descriptio: I had to sleep alone in an awful room, without even my herd to keep me safe.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.1.label: dull bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.1.descriptio: I had to sleep alone in an dull room, without even my herd to keep me safe.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.2.label: mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.2.descriptio: I had to sleep in a room all by myself, away from the safety of the herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.3.label: decent bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.3.descriptio: I had to sleep in a room all by myself, away from the safety of the herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.4.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own in a slightly impressive bedroom. It was alright, but I felt unsafe without the rest of my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.5.descriptio: I slept on my own in an impressive bedroom. It was fine, but I would have felt safer with the rest of my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.6.label: very impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.6.descriptio: I slept in a very impressive bedroom on my own. It's nice, but I miss my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.7.descriptio: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. It's great, but I wish my herdmates were there.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.8.descriptio: I slept in an unbelievably impressive bedroom. It was marvelous, but I felt like something was missing without my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.9.descriptio: I slept in a heavenly bedroom. It was so astounding, I didn't even mind sleeping away from the rest of the herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.0.label: awful barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.0.descriptio: The herd had to sleep in an awful barrack, but at least we had safety in numbers.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.1.label: dull barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.1.descriptio: The herd had to sleep in a dull barrack, but at least we had safety in numbers.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.2.label: mediocre barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.2.descriptio: I slept together with the herd in a mediocre barrack. It's safer than sleeping alone, at least.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.3.descriptio: I slept together together with the herd in a decent barrack. It was safe and comforting.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.4.descriptio: I slept in a pretty nice barrack with the rest of my herd. This is great.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.5.label: impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.5.descriptio: I slept in an impressive barrack with the rest of my herd. I love it.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.6.label: very impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.6.descriptio: I got to sleep in a very impressive barrack with my herd. It was wonderful.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.7.descriptio: I got to sleep in an extremely impressive barrack with my herd. It was truly marvelous.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.8.descriptio: I got to sleep in a barrack that was unbelievably impressive, and I even got to share it with my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.9.descriptio: The herd got to share a barrack that was simply wondrous. I could just stay here with my herd forever.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedAscetic.stages.0.label: ascetic slept alone
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedAscetic.stages.0.descriptio: I had to sleep in a room by myself, away from the safety of my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedAscetic.stages.1.label: ascetic slept with herd
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedAscetic.stages.1.descriptio: I was able to share a barrack with my herd. It felt safe and comfy.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.0.label: no pack
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind. I feel so alone without a proper pack.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.1.label: small pack
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small pack. It's a bit lonely.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.2.label: decent pack
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.2.description: There's a decent number people in my pack. I'm glad to have them.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.3.label: huge pack
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my pack. This is great!
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.0.descriptio: I had to sleep in an awful room, and I didn't even get to share it with my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.1.label: dull bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.1.descriptio: I had to sleep in an dull room, and I didn't even get to share it with my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.2.label: mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.2.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own, separated from my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.3.label: decent bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.3.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own, separated from my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.4.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own in a slightly impressive bedroom. It was alright, but I'd prefer to sleep with my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.5.descriptio: I slept on my own in an impressive bedroom. It was fine, but I miss my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.6.label: very impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.6.descriptio: I slept in a very impressive bedroom on my own. It was nice, but it would have been better with the rest of the pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.7.descriptio: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. It was great, but I wish I could have shared it with my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.8.descriptio: I slept in an unbelievably impressive bedroom. It was marvelous, but it just didn't feel complete without the rest of my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.9.descriptio: I slept in a heavenly bedroom. It was so astounding, I could almost forget I had to sleep away from the pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.0.label: awful barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.0.descriptio: We had to sleep in an awful barrack, but at least the pack slept together.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.1.label: dull barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.1.descriptio: We had to sleep in a dull barrack, but at least the pack slept together.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.2.label: mediocre barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.2.descriptio: The pack slept together in a mediocre barrack. It beats sleeping alone.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.3.descriptio: The pack slept together in a decent barrack. This feels nice.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.4.descriptio: The pack slept together in a pretty nice barrack. This is great.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.5.label: impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.5.descriptio: The pack slept together in an impressive barrack. We loved it.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.6.label: very impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.6.descriptio: The pack got to sleep together in a very impressive barrack. It was wonderful.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.7.descriptio: The pack got to sleep together in an extremely impressive barrack. It was truly marvelous.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.8.descriptio: The pack got to share a barrack that was unbelievably impressive. There's nothing better than sleeping with my pack in a room like this.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.9.descriptio: The pack got to share a barrack that was simply wondrous. I could just stay here with my pack forever.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedAscetic.stages.0.label: ascetic slept alone
